name: Backseat AI
description:
You have always dreamed of piloting a giant robot. Unfortunately, so has the robot's autopilot AI. How long can you last before it gets you both killed?

A bug may cause the robot's arm to point at the top left corner, refresh the page is this happens.

Use WASD to move, mouse to aim and shoot, space to beep (or boop).

Created in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2020
